attributes.action: Stop supplying weapons and providing support to the Saudi-led coalition in Yemen
attributes.additional_details: The UK has been silent about what is happening in Yemen and our involvement. We are complicit, and we must educate our general public on what is happening, and take action to stop the conflict, from all sides.
attributes.background: The UK has supplied weapons responsible for civilian fatalities, mostly from airstrikes. A report from a UN panel of experts states that participants involved are liable for war crimes, and the UK can be held legally responsible if the standards for complicity are met.
